name: City Eye: Prologue
description:
In the world of City Eye, you’ll become an operator of the Central Monitoring System, which will try to prevent the effects of every single emergency in the city. Use the map to track dangerous areas and don’t let the suspects run away from the Police. City Eye: Prologue allows you to complete first stage of the game.



Find the danger, track criminals, and call the emergency services when necessary. Stay vigilant – dealing with multiple events at the same time is harder than you think!



Switch between cameras to mark suspicious individuals and help the Police to catch criminals or prevent crime. Careful observation, quick decision making, and prediction is the key to success.



As an emergency operator, you’ll have to deal with such dangers as:
  • Destruction of property,
  • Fire,
  • vandalism,
  • fainting,
  • drug sale.


The safety of the city's citizens depends on you!
